attributes.action: ....not give the torturers and killers of toddler Jamie Bulger a new life in Australia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In February 1993 a young boy of 3 was taken from a Liverpool shopping centre 
by two 10-year-old boys.

Jamie Bulger walked away from his mother for only a second; Jon Venables 
took his hand and led him out of the mall with his friend Robert Thompson.
They took Jamie on a walk for over 2 ½ miles, along the way stopping every 
now and again to torture the poor little boy who was crying constantly for 
his mummy.

Finally they stopped at a railway track where they brutally kicked him, 
threw stones at him, rubbed paint in his eyes, pushed batteries up his anus 
and cut his fingers off with scissors. Other mutilations were inflicted but 
not reported in the press. What these two boys did was so horrendous that 
Jamie's mother was forbidden to identify his body. They then left his small 
beaten body on railway tracks so a train could run him over to hide the mess 
they had created. These two boys, even being boys, understood what they did 
was wrong, hence trying to make it look like an accident.
They are being relocated to Australia to live out the rest of their lives. 
They disgustingly and violently took Jamie's life away and in return they 
each get a new life!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
